includedAssets.title: Pilot
includedAssets.synopsis: Small-town preacher Jesse Custer (Dominic Cooper) goes on a mission to defeat the supernatural evil that destroyed his hometown.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Small-town preacher Jesse Custer (Dominic Cooper) goes on a mission to defeat the supernatural evil that destroyed his hometown.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Small-town preacher Jesse Custer (Dominic Cooper) goes on a mission to defeat the supernatural evil that destroyed his hometown.

includedAssets.title: See
includedAssets.synopsis: As Jesse attempts to re-evaluate his work, two men hunt for the mysterious force inside him.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As Jesse attempts to re-evaluate his work, two men hunt for the mysterious force inside him.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As Jesse attempts to re-evaluate his work, two men hunt for the mysterious force inside him.

includedAssets.title: The Possibilities
includedAssets.synopsis: Jesse explores his newfound powers, while Tulip encourages him to pursue his revenge.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Jesse explores his newfound powers, while Tulip encourages him to pursue his revenge.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Jesse explores his newfound powers, while Tulip encourages him to pursue his revenge.

includedAssets.title: Monster Swamp
includedAssets.synopsis: Jesse tempts Quincannon with an irresistible bet, while Tulip decides to take the law into her own hands.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Jesse tempts Quincannon with an irresistible bet, while Tulip decides to take the law into her own hands.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Jesse tempts Quincannon with an irresistible bet, while Tulip decides to take the law into her own hands.

includedAssets.title: South Will Rise Again
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep5 - South Will Rise Again
includedAssets.synopsis: Following his stunt, Jesse deals with being the biggest star in Annville. Tulip and Cassidy grow closer.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Following his stunt, Jesse deals with being the biggest star in Annville. Tulip and Cassidy grow closer.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Following his stunt, Jesse deals with being the biggest star in Annville. Tulip and Cassidy grow closer.

includedAssets.title: Sundowner
includedAssets.synopsis: Jesse finally learns the truth of what exactly has taken over his body as he comes face to face with Deblanc and Fiore.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Jesse finally learns the truth of what exactly has taken over his body as he comes face to face with Deblanc and Fiore.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Jesse finally learns the truth of what exactly has taken over his body as he comes face to face with Deblanc and Fiore.

includedAssets.title: He Gone
includedAssets.synopsis: The root of Jesse's guilt finally comes to light as his actions become more and more dangerous for those around him.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The root of Jesse's guilt finally comes to light as his actions become more and more dangerous for those around him.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The root of Jesse's guilt finally comes to light as his actions become more and more dangerous for those around him.

includedAssets.title: El Valero
includedAssets.synopsis: As Tulip attempts to save a friend, Jesse goes toe to toe with Quincannon and the Meat Men to try and save his church.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As Tulip attempts to save a friend, Jesse goes toe to toe with Quincannon and the Meat Men to try and save his church.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As Tulip attempts to save a friend, Jesse goes toe to toe with Quincannon and the Meat Men to try and save his church.

includedAssets.title: Finish The Song
includedAssets.synopsis: With Jesse on the run, everyone is forced to make critical choices.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: With Jesse on the run, everyone is forced to make critical choices.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: With Jesse on the run, everyone is forced to make critical choices.

includedAssets.title: Call And Response
includedAssets.synopsis: Season finale. As the town waits in anticipation, Jesse attempts to fulfil his promise.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Season finale. As the town waits in anticipation, Jesse attempts to fulfil his promise.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Season finale. As the town waits in anticipation, Jesse attempts to fulfil his promise.

includedAssets.title: Season 1
includedAssets.synopsis: Dominic Cooper stars as Texan preacher Jesse Custer who, after a supernatural event, is possessed by a mysterious force that gives him a strange power. Adaptation of the cult comic.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Dominic Cooper stars as a preacher possessed by a mysterious force and given a strange power after a supernatural event. Adaptation of the cult comic.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Dominic Cooper stars as Texan preacher Jesse Custer who, after a supernatural event, is possessed by a mysterious force that gives him a strange power. Adaptation of the cult comic.

includedIn.title: Preacher
